alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Nassau, north central Bradford, Baker, Union, southern Columbia, northwestern Duval, southern Camden and southeastern Charlton Counties through 645 AM EST... At 600 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Kings Ferry to near Columbia. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Hilliard, Lake Butler, Callahan, Raiford, Kings Bay Base, Columbia, Taylor and Macclenny. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for northern and northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Duval
